content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Good afternoon, Mr. Rahman. Thank you for considering my apartment for rental. I believe that the apartment is well-suited for your needs and I am confident that we can come to an agreement on the rental price. What is your proposed rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I want to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible. Can you tell me how much you are asking for?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: I apologize, Mr. Rahman, but I am not able to disclose the rental price that I am asking for at this time. I am currently in the process of negotiating with other potential tenants and I do not want to limit my options. However, I can assure you that my rental price is competitive and reflects the value of the apartment and its location. Would you be able to provide me with a range of rental prices that you are considering?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to negotiate on the rental price. What is your minimum rental price?

I am willing to negotiate on the rental price. What is your minimum rental price?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: My minimum rental price for this apartment is 700 Euros per month, Mr. Rahman. I believe that this is a fair and reasonable price given the size and location of the apartment, as well as the amenities and utilities that are included. However, I am open to negotiating on the rental price and am willing to consider your proposal if it is within my range. What is your proposed rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine
